ChatActivity - Class in com.example.hiveeapp.student_user.chat
ChatActivity handles the chat interface for the student user, including sending and receiving messages via WebSocket.

ChatDto - Class in com.example.hiveeapp.student_user.chat
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for Chat, encapsulating details of a chat session, including chat ID, employer ID, student ID, job posting ID, job title, last message, last message time, and student name.
ChatDto(int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class com.example.hiveeapp.student_user.chat.ChatDto
Constructs a ChatDto with basic parameters for backward compatibility.

Constructs a ChatDto with all parameters.
